general_description: The workspace area features laboratories, corridors, and common areas such as cafeterias and lobbies.
The Main Corridor has multiple doors, some shared with known rooms, facilitating easy access throughout the workspace.
The coordinates of the walls and central points of each space are specified to define boundaries and facilitate navigation.
Some spaces lack certain walls or have open access instead of doors, indicating direct connections to adjacent areas.
Areas without walls are directly connected to adjacent spaces, allowing for an open layout between connected spaces.
